title: skript的title怎么使用
txt_content:
我看到文档是写的这样
模型: send title %text% [with subtitle %text%] [to %players%] [for %time span%] [with fade[(-| )]in %time span%] [(and|with) fade[(-| )]out %time span%] send subtitle %text% [to %players%] [for %time span%] [with fade[(-| )]in %time span%] [(and|with) fade[(-| )]out %time span%] 加入的版本: 2.3 向玩家发送一个标题信息，并为1.11及以上版本的Minecraft提供可选的fadein/stay/fadeout时间。注意：如果没有为标题/副标题或时间提供输入，它将保留上次发送的标题，使用重置标题效果恢复默认值。 示例: send title "Competition Started" with subtitle "Have fun, Stay safe!" to player for 5 seconds send title "Hi %player%" to player send title "Loot Drop" with subtitle "starts in 3 minutes" to all players send title "Hello %player%!" with subtitle "Welcome to our server" to player for 5 seconds with fadein 1 second and fade out 1 second send subtitle "Party!" to all players send title "为什么那么多东西没在wiki翻译更新！！！累死我了QAQ" to player for 233 seconds
我写的是这样
on spawn:
    wait 1 seconds
    if lore of event-entity's tool contains "BOSS复活通知":
        loop entities in radius 100 around event-entity:
            loop-entity is a player
            send title "%name of event-entity%&B出现在附近！" to loop-entity
            send subtitle "&C危险警告！" to loop-entity

是文档写错了嘛 还是我的有问题 提示的是
Can't understand this condition/effect: title send "%name of event-entity%&B出现在附近！" to loop-entity (BOSS复活通知.sk, line 6: title send "%name of event-entity%&B出现在附近！" to loop-entity')
[15:30:07] [Server thread/ERROR]: Can't understand this condition/effect: send subtitle "&C危险警告！" (BOSS复活通知.sk, line 7: send subtitle "&C危险警告！"')

replies.txt_content:
on spawn:
    wait 1 seconds
    if lore of event-entity's tool contains "BOSS复活通知":
        loop entities in radius 100 around event-entity:
            loop-entity is a player
            send player title "%name of event-entity%&B出现在附近！" with subtitle "&C危险警告！" for 2.4 seconds
